import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from "react-router"; import { Card, Icon, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import JobAdvertisementService from '../services/JobAdvertisementService' export default function JobAdvertisementDetails() { let { jobAdvertisement_id } = useParams() const [jobAdvertisementDetail, setJobAdvertisementDetail] = useState() useEffect(() => { let jobAdvertisementService = new JobAdvertisementService() jobAdvertisementService.getById(jobAdvertisement_id).then(result => setJobAdvertisementDetail(result.data.data)) }) return (

{jobAdvertisement_id}

{jobAdvertisementDetail ? ((
{jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.companyName} {jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.webSite} {jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.companyEmail} {jobAdvertisementDetail.employer.phoneNumber} 22 Friends
)) : null}
) }
